ComicInfo.Summary:
"Seven Days," Part Seven
Welcome to the 77th Annual Superhero Awards. Who will win "Best Superheroine?" And more importantly, what will she wear?
Notes:
The cover is a homage and a parody of the covers of People magazine.
ComicInfo.Title: Seven Days, Part Seven
